name: Spinach and Cheese Stuffed Pasta Shells
author: KITKATY
summary: Magnificent jumbo pasta shells stuffed to bursting with cheesy spinach filling.
ingredients: 2 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bring a large pot of salted water to boil, gently place pasta shells in boiling water; bring water back to boil
Cook until noodles are just tender; drain well
Combine spinach, ricotta, 1/3 cup Parmesan cheese, fennel, basil and garlic in a large mixing bowl
Season with salt and pepper; mix well
Spread 1/2 cup marinara sauce evenly over the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish
Fill each pasta shell with the spinach cheese mixture
Arrange the shells, filling side up in the baking dish
Spoon remaining marinara sauce over the shells
Sprinkle remaining Parmesan cheese on top of the shells
Cover the pan loosely with aluminum foil and bake in preheated oven until heated through; about 30 minutes
